alert.note: Alert for Inland Palm Beach County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 15 at 5:39PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Palm Beach County through 615 PM EDT... At 539 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a strong thunderstorm capable of producing a landspout near Loxahatchee NWR, or 8 miles south of Wellington, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Landspouts and winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Wellington, Greenacres, Atlantis, Loxahatchee NWR, Kings Point, Village Of Golf, Morikami Park, Aberdeen, Villages Of Oriole, Aberdeen Golf Course, Boca Raton Equestrian and Lake Worth Corridor. LANDSPOUT...POSSIBLE MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
